question: Name two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy.
asked_question_translated: Ä®vardykite du senovinius rajonus, kuriuos Materoje (Italija) skiria Gravina.
answer: Materoje (Italija) du senovinius rajonus, kuriuos skiria Gravina, vadiname Sassi Barisano ir Sassi Caveoso.
answer_translated_eng: In Matera (Italy), the two ancient districts separated by the Gravina are called Sassi Barisano and Sassi Caveoso.
